actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to provide equity to producers in establishing payment rates for storage of wheat and feed grains.

summary.text: Agricultural Equity Act of 1988 - Amends the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to provide for a specified 1988 increase for on-farm wheat and feed grain storage rates if commercial storage rate increases for Commodity Credit Corporation wheat and feed grains are approved.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to provide equity to producers in establishing payment rates for storage of wheat and feed grains.
